home.subtitle: Turn your ideas into fun games and useful tools with AI.
home.freeCreationDesc: Enter any idea, AI will help you realize it. Fully express your creativity.
home.gameLabDesc: Fuse multiple game types to create unique gameplay.
home.communityWorksDesc: Discover and experience games from community creators
home.ctaDesc: Join the creator community and turn ideas into reality
home.footerDesc: Create everything with AI, share your creativity
home.creator: Creator

gameLab.title: Game Lab
